Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Componente del comitato scientifico del "Journal of Histories of Post-War Architecture (HsPWA)", Dipartimento di Architettura, Università di Bologna, Bologna
Componente del comitato scientifico della collana “Storia dell'architettura e della città. Studi e ricerche”, Franco Angeli, Milano

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Organizzatore della conferenza internazionale “The Americanization of Postwar Architecture”, University of Toronto, Toronto, Canada

“A Dialogue with Dissonant Voices: Planning Exchanges Between the United States and Italy, 1945-1955”, paper presentato alla 12th International Planning History Conference, Indian Institute of Technology, New Delhi, India

“Tensions in Postwar Italian Architecture: Receptions and Rejections of American Modernism during the Years of the Cold War”, paper presentato alla 95th Annual Conference of the College Art Association, New York, USA
“Le Centre de calcul électronique Olivetti à Rho”, paper presentato al XVe Rencontre de la Fondation Le Corbusier (“L’Italie de Le Corbusier: 1907-1965”), Roma

“Receptions and Rejections of American Modernism in Postwar Italian Architecture”, paper presentato alla Eidgenössische Technische Hochschule/Society of Architectural Historians/European Architectural History Network joint conference “Transfer and Metamorphosis: Architectural Modernity between Europe and the Americas 1870–1970”, Zurigo, Svizzera
Co-chair della sessione “Photography and Architecture: Shaping a New Dialogue” al 97th Annual Conference of the College Art Association, Los Angeles, USA
Moderatore alla conferenza “Futurism at 100: The Measure of a Century, 1909-2009”, Minda de Gunzburg Center for European Studies, Harvard University, Cambridge Mass., USA

“‘Those kitchens we cannot have:’ America and the transformation of Italy’s domestic space during the 1950s and 1960s”, paper presentato a The 36th Association of Art Historians Conference, University of Glasgow, Glasgow, Gran Bretagna

“Appréhender l’architecture moderne: la place de Michel Ragon dans l’historiographie de l’architecture des années 1950 et 1960”, paper presentato al colloquium “Michel Ragon, Critique d’art et d’architecture”, Institut national d’histoire de l’art, Parigi, Francia

“The persisting success of biography: architecture as a narrative of the individual”, paper presentato al 1st International Meeting of the European Architectural History Network, Guimarães, Portogallo

“Moving Forward, Looking Backward: Italian Architecture between the Years of Postwar Reconstruction and the Birth of Consumer Society”, paper presentato alla conferenza “Italy’s/Italies Today: An Interdisciplinary Conference Marking 150 Years of Italian Nationhood”, University of New Hampshire, Durham N.H., USA

“A Change at Different Pace: Architecture and Society in Postwar Italy”, paper presentato al simposio “Thresholds: Place and Margin in Italian Visual Culture, 1950s-Present”, CUNY-Hunter College, New York, USA

Co-chair della sessione “Shaping a Middle Class Life: Architecture, Domestic Space and Building Programs since the Birth of Consumer Society” al 2nd International Meeting of the European Architectural History Network, Bruxelles, Belgio
“Elements for a Transnational History of Planning: Oskar Stonorov’s Cross-Atlantic Connections”, paper presentato al 15th International Planning History Conference, San Paolo, Brasile
Moderatore alla conferenza “Untying ‘The Knot’: The State of Postwar Italian Art History Today”, The Center for Modern Italian Art, New York, USA
Chair della sessione “Reassessing the Cold War in Architecture and Planning” al 68th Annual Meeting of the Society of Architectural Historians, Chicago, USA

Moderatore della sessione arte e architettura alla conferenza “Becoming TransGerman: Transnational, Transdisciplinary, Transhuman”, 5th Berlin Program Summer Workshop, Freie Universität, Berlino, Germania
Co-organizzazione del Workshop internazionale “Actors and Vehicles of Architectural Criticism”, Università degli Studi di Bologna, Bologna

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Glück, Stadt, Raum/Happiness, City, Space, contratto di ricerca, Nederlands Architectuurinstituut, Rotterdam (Olanda) - Akademie der Künste, Berlino (Germania)
José Luis Sert at Boston University, finanziamento di ricerca, The BU Arts Initiative, Office of the Provost, Boston University, Boston (USA)

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Coordinatore della ricerca “Adriano Olivetti e l'urbanistica”, Fondazione Adriano Olivetti, Roma
Valutatore esterno per il Fondo Nazionale Svizzero per la Ricerca Scientifica, Berna, Svizzera

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Visiting Scholarship Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Cambridge Mass., USA
Visiting Scholarship Canadian Centre for Architecture (CCA), Montréal, Canada
Ailsa Mellon Bruce Visiting Senior Fellowship Center for the Advanced Studies in the Visual Arts (CASVA), National Gallery of Art, Washington D.C., USA
Junior Fellowship Boston University Humanities Foundation, Boston, USA

Arquitetura moderna como discurso transnacional: itinerários, permutas e narrativas entre os séculos XIX e XX Seminario di Master e Dottorato svolto presso il Programa de Pesquisa e Pós-Graduação em Arquitetura, Faculdade de Arquitetura (PROPAR), Universidade Federal do Rio Grande so Sul, Porto Alegre, Brasile
